# Welcome {-#Welcome}

Welcome to the Quantitative Methods in the Social Sciences lab workbook!

![](./images/quant_methods_hex.svg){fig-alt="Hexsticker for UofG UG Hons Quants Methods."}

This workbook is for University of Glasgow students enrolled in the undergraduate **Quantitative Methods in the Social Sciences** course within the School of Social and Political Sciences. The activities are designed for [Posit Cloud](https://posit.cloud/).

These webpages are made with {{< fa brands r-project >}} and [Quarto](https://quarto.org) and licensed under the {{< fa brands creative-commons >}} {{< fa brands creative-commons-by >}} {{< fa brands creative-commons-nc >}} {{< fa brands creative-commons-sa >}} [Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/).
